tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE anomaly_detection (
    detection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    sensor_id INT,
    anomaly_type VARCHAR,
    detection_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (sensor_id) REFERENCES sensor_data(sensor_id)
);

CREATE TABLE anomaly_detection (
    detection_id INT,
    sensor_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    detected_anomaly VARCHAR,
    anomaly_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE anomaly_log (
    log_id INT,
    detection_id INT,
    log_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    anomaly_type VARCHAR,
    anomaly_message TEXT
);
